Name: Juicy Memory Card
About the game: Juicy Memory Card - an Exciting game in the genre of 'Find a Pair', every time you find a pair in your limited time comes a bonus, but the longer you think, the faster your time will pass and you will be the loser. At the end of each completed level, you will find a colorful picture. Train your memory and reaction! Game features: Search For Paired Cards unique design Beautiful Visual style 30 cool levels memory training
